title: 一个未经授权将一国外整合包用于商业用途的人
author: 盗版散文家
txt_content:
本帖最后由 盗版散文家 于 2020-4-25 11:42 编辑 

是一个国外的整合包，未经授权直接将整合包用于开放商业服务器，且借用（可能是借用）他人MCBBS账号用于宣传服务器，具体见https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=1018588&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D3%26searchoption%5B21%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3DIBP%26searchoption%5B21%5D%5Btype%5D%3D%26searchoption%5B23%5D%5Bvalue%5D%5B36%5D%3D36%26searchoption%5B23%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dcheckbox%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D2%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dselect%26searchoption%5B81%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D1%26searchoption%5B81%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dradio%26searchoption%5B80%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D2%26searchoption%5B80%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dradio%26searchoption%5B207%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D1%26searchoption%5B207%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dselect。原整合包下载地址：https://www.curseforge.com/minec ... ntegration-by-parts

replies.author: lishanglin
replies.txt_content:
。。。地址放错了

话说论坛还管授权吗，人家随便加几个或者去几个mod缝合一下不就是个新整合包了吗
管不到那么宽吧

replies.author: 盗版散文家
replies.txt_content: 哎，我也不确定管不管，主要还是cf举报费劲

replies.author: 盗版散文家
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... %5Btype%5D%3Dselect
啊，放错地址了（抱歉）
